availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lloyd M. Lowe (Hopkins County, Kentucky, commonwealth's attorney)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth's attorney. Maryland native. Married Susan E. Robertson Lowe in Hopkins County on December 2, 1858. Father of Annie Lowe. Resident of St. Georges, County, Maryland in 1850. Attorney in Hopkins County, Kentucky in 1860. Commonwealth's attorney for the Fourteenth Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1860 to 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Maryland, St. Georges County, Piscataway District, p. 119B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 813.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Hopkins County Marriages, p. 18.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7019158, Jefferson County Deaths, File #14981.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1860,” in 1861 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1861), 355.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 303-308.
The American Almanac and Repository of Useful Knowledge for the Year 1861 (Boston: Crosby, Nichols, Lee and Co., 1861), p. 230.
